name: ClightMore (GMTK jam)
description:
My submission for the 2018 GMTK Game Jam.  Please read instructions below as there is no ingame tutorial.

"What would happen when you only had a sword and all the enemies had guns?" Well.... if you ever had this question then i have an answer!

Move by using WASD  

Left click to slash your sword,  deflecting enemy bullets 

Right click to block , slowing you down and deflecting with lower accuracy

Collect black orbs to get score
